sentence: On stage with Trump on Saturday, Perdue falsely declared that the 2020 election and his own runoff were absolutely stolen!? Moments later, he promised to jail the people responsible? and gave a big thumbs up to the crowd chanting, Lock him up!? referring to Brian Kemp.

sentence: Under the once-in-a-decade redistricting process, Georgias Republican governor, Brian Kemp, signed into law a new map that transformed Ms. McBaths district to favor Republicans overwhelmingly.

sentence: Former President Donald Trump's refusal to move on from the 2020 presidential election might backfire for the Republican Party in Georgia, where incumbent GOP Governor Brian Kemp is facing a challenge from Democratic gubernatorial nominee Stacey Abrams.

title: Trump's Ongoing War With Brian Kemp Could Boost Stacey Abrams in Georgia
